attributes.action: make it possible to give a signature against as well as for a petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some petitions, although thoroughly subscribed, are obnoxious to many voters, who would like to record their opposition to a particular petitioned measure and have the net positive (or negative) subscription total recorded.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
